https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fZKVYWy9cTwd0LKdpWUHNxSNhOF.jpg Daniel reached the limit of his patience with his wife. The extremely temperamental Natalia is always protesting. But Daniel does not have the courage to ask for a divorce. Thus, he accepts the advice of his friends to hire a famous local Don Juan to seduce his wife and be she who deserted him. A Boyfriend for My Wife
